text: Marie Versini (10 August 1940 â€“ 22 November 2021) was a French actress. She was born in Paris. Her career began in 1958 and she retired in 2019. She was known for her role in Roger Corman's 1963 movie The Young Racers. Versini died on 22 November 2021 in Guingamp, France at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Marie Versini
